name: Content Flow Service
description: Backend service powering the Salsify workflow platform. Handles workflow orchestration, task management, and event processing. Built on Rails with Kafka for event-driven architecture. Integrates with Dandelion for user/product data and publishes events to email-service, indexing-service, and dependency-service.

name: Content Flow
description: Salsify's workflow platform for managing content processes. Provides configurable workflow templates, task management, and step-based content flows. The technical implementation is powered by content-flow-service.

name: Flow Template
description: A template that defines the structure of a workflow in the Content Flow platform. Contains configuration for steps, tasks, and the overall flow of content through the workflow process.

name: Step Template
description: Configurable templates for individual steps within a workflow. Defined in app/models/content_flow/step_templates in content-flow-service. Updated via rake db:migrate which re-imports all step templates.

name: Task Configuration
description: Configuration entity in content-flow-service that defines how tasks are set up within workflows. Has property dependencies that are tracked via the dependency-service for managing reports and destroyed dependencies.

name: Dandelion
description: Salsify's core Items Repository service. Provides user, product, and organization data. Other services like content-flow-service integrate with Dandelion for authentication (via api-gateway), entity data, and event subscriptions. Publishes events for products, digital assets, subscriptions, organizations, users, and groups.

name: Salsify Kafka
description: Internal Kafka eventing framework gem used by Salsify services. Provides event handling infrastructure including actor configuration, event-to-handler mappings, and message processing. Content-flow-service and other services build on this for event-driven architecture.

name: Salsify Avro
description: Helper gem for working with Avro schemas in Salsify services. Works alongside avromatic and salsify_kafka for event schema management.

name: Avromatic
description: Salsify's open-source gem for defining event schemas using Avro. Creates Ruby classes representing events that can be instantiated for publishing and are used by salsify_kafka when consuming messages.

name: Email Service
description: Salsify service responsible for sending emails. Receives events from other services like content-flow-service to trigger email notifications.

name: Indexing Service
description: Salsify service that powers search and indexing functionality, including the task index page in the workflow platform. Receives events from content-flow-service.

name: Dependency Service
description: Salsify service for tracking dependencies between entities across services. Receives dependency registration messages on the dependency_requests Kafka topic. Used to power reports and manage destroyed dependencies. Content-flow-service uses it to track property dependencies of TaskConfigurations.

name: Infrastructure Management Platform
description: Salsify's internal platform for managing service infrastructure and deployments. Services like content-flow-service can be viewed and managed at infra-mgmt.ops.salsify.com.
